body.p: This page is generated by Machine Translation from Japanese.

section.name: System information
section.p: Here, you can currently check property information such as system environment variables.

subsection.name: How to display
subsection.p: In Administrator account after logging in, click system information menu.

subsection.name: Environment variables
subsection.p: You can list the server environment variable.

subsection.name: System Properties
subsection.p: You can list the system properties on Fess.

subsection.name: For bug reports
subsection.p: Is a list of properties to attach when reporting a bug. Extract the value contains no personal information.
